headline.main: Pentagon Commits More Forces to War

lead_paragraph: The Pentagon continues to bolster its forces near Afghanistan, asking Uzbekistan to accept three gunships and planning to base warplanes in two other Central Asian nations. The aim is to intensify pressure on the shrinking havens still held by Taliban and Al Qaeda forces. The military also expanded its net for trapping anyone who flees, putting more troops on the ground and using an experimental reconnaissance aircraft to hunt down potential targets where they hide. American warships will begin intercepting ships suspected of ferrying Al Qaeda leaders or matériel out of Pakistan.
abstract: Pentagon's bolstering of forces in and near Afghanistan noted
